description: Numbers n such that continued fraction for sqrt(n) has even period 2*m and the m-th term is 6.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: n = 1; t = {}; While[Length[t] < 50, n++; If[! IntegerQ[Sqrt[n]], c = ContinuedFraction[Sqrt[n]]; len = Length[c[[2]]]; If[EvenQ[len] && c[[2, len/2]] == 6, AppendTo[t, n]]]]; t (* _T. D. Noe_, Apr 04 2014 *)
author: _David W. Wilson_
